body.name: CROS 60 Loads Laundry Detergent Sheets Linen Scent, for Travel, Home, Apartment, Dorm, Laundry Detergent Strips Eco Friendly, Hypoallergenic, Liquidless Washing Supplies

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Powerful Clean: Laundry detergent sheets are a convenient and environmentally friendly alternative to traditional liquid or powder laundry detergents, with more powerful cleaning power.The low foam characteristic of laundry sheets makes them highly suitable for efficient washing and easy rinsing, eliminating the need for additional rinse cycles. More water-efficient!

Easily Dissolve: Completely soluble in hot or cold water, these detergent tablets clean the toughest stains leaving your laundry fresh, clean and spotless without damaging your fabrics.This Septic safe laundry detergent can be used with top Loaders, Front Loaders, and HE (High Efficiency).

Reduced Packaging Waste:Laundry detergent sheets are often packaged in minimal and recyclable or compostable packaging, which reduces plastic jug waste and contributes to environmental conservation compared to traditional liquid or powder detergents.

Hypoallergenic Options: CROS offers hypoallergenic laundry detergents for those with sensitive skin that contain no harsh ingredients that may cause skin problems.This means they are hypoallergenic, vegan, bleach-free, paraben-free, and phosphate-free.

Precise Dosage: Laundry detergent sheets are easy to use. You just need to toss one or more sheets directly into the washing machine. Since they come pre-measured, you don't have to worry about using too much or too little detergent. And there's no liquid or powder to spill, so there's less mess to clean up. This can help you save money and reduce detergent waste. It's also safer to store if you have curious children or pets.

Portability:Laundry detergent sheets are thin, paper-like sheets. The packaging is so lightweight and compact, making them a great choice for travelers or people with limited storage. You can easily carry them to the in your luggage or laundromat, while traveling, or when visiting friends without adding much weight or taking up space.(Up to 60 Loads)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Thank you for choosing CROS laundry detergent sheets.

Dissolve Quickly Clean clothes with surfactants and enzymes,Works well in both hot and cold water dissolve quickly and leave no residue on your clothes. removing stains with ease and leaving your clothes looking like new again. Hand Wash & Zero Waste Can be used for hand wash & zero waste. Effortlessly measure the detergent sheet you need. Because 1 sheet is equal to 1 cap of liquid detergent or 1 pod. Septic safe laundry detergent sheets can be used with top Loaders, Front Loaders, and HE (High Efficiency). Hypoallergenic Laundry Strips No irritating ingredients that cause skin issues, harmful chemicals free. Hypoallergenic safe for sensitive skin & baby that have a mild and fragrant scent that helps to relieve stress. Low Foam More Water-Efficient Laundry detergent sheets are formulated with a low sudsing formula. The same powerful cleansing power, but without a lot of suds during the washing process, eliminating the need for additional rinse cycles, Get the same clean clothes with less water!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These laundry detergent sheets are pretty awesome! I've been using them for a while, and I have to say, they make laundry day a breeze. The fresh lavender scent smells sooo good.. nothing too overpowering, just a pleasant hint that lingers on my clothes. The best part is how convenient and enviro friendly they are. No more dealing with heavy detergent bottles or accidental spills. Just grab a sheet, toss it in with your laundry, and voila! It dissolves quickly, leaving your clothes smelling great and perfectly clean. For someone like me who's always on the go, the portability is amazinggg. Whether I'm at home, traveling, or in my dorm, these sheets are a lifesaver. Plus, they're hypoallergenic, so no worries about skin sensitivity. If you're looking for a hassle-free, planet friendly laundry solution with a lovely lavender scent, these sheets are the way to go! Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 360 Loads Laundry Detergent Sheets
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These papers are so convenient that their usefulness cannot be overemphasized. In addition to leaving my clothing with a perfume that is invigorating and clean, they are wonderful for use in the house since they dissolve effortlessly in water of any temperature. The fact that they are equally effective in high-efficiency machines as well as standard washers makes them quite adaptable. The fact that they do not need measuring or dealing with dirty liquid detergents is another advantage of using them. The pre-measured sheets remove the need for me to make educated guesses, guaranteeing that I use precisely the appropriate quantity for each load. As a result, this not only helps save time but also cuts down on waste, which contributes to a more environmentally friendly washing routine. As a result of their hypoallergenic properties, they are soft on the skin, and the lack of harsh chemicals is in perfect harmony with my dedication to leading a more environmentally conscious lifestyle. When it comes to travel, the sheets are a fantastic choice since they are not only small and lightweight, but they also do not make a mess, making them a hassle-free washing alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I started using these when one of my kids started developing a rash from their clothing due to a previously used detergent. I love that these are hypoallergenic, I don’t have to worry about the discomfort of a rash due to what I wash our clothing in. I also prefer these sheets over the pods that I used to toss into my washing machine. I travel a lot and do my laundry on the go - the pods have caused me trouble in the past by bursting and creating a disastrous mess in my suitcase. These sheets are easier for me to pack and I can confidently say that I don't have to worry about such mishaps with these sheets. Also they don’t leave behind any type of residue on my clothing. They are similar to dryer sheets in terms of their texture, but the only distinction is that these sheets are meant for cleaning in the wash. Not only are my clothes clean, but they also smell amazing. The scent is a nice, relaxing lavender.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cleanent without being over perfumed
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We got these because we often camp in an RV, and being able to do laundry while we're out and about is crucial. Please take up such little room and depending on the size of the load, you just use half or a whole sheet and it works amazingly. The scent is not too strong, unlike some others, but everything comes out smelling very nice and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All I use
reviews.reviewText: I started using these a while back because I liked the fact that I got rid of the messy bottle and that each sheet was so concentrated and that you don't have to have all these wet chemicals in big plastic bottles hanging around but instead you have little boxes that smell amazing and will make your mail and house smell amazing. These are easy to use and it explains to you how much each sheet can handle with clothes and the best part is they even tear in half so that way, if you don't have a large load, you're able to only use what you need

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I save space in laundry area n no mess! Great product and I spend about same amount of money on liquid container and this product. I get more loads of laundry then in liquid container.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell. Seems to work good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these sheets and will continue to use. I am so happy to not lug large plastic containers home from the store. So much better for the environment! Lavender is a great light scent, unscented is nice too. For heavily soiled loads I use a full sheet but most daily laundry requires 1/2 sheet. Great value.
